sentences.sContent: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.sCn: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.sContent: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.sCn: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

sentences.sContent: ...We have everything to gain by encouraging them to explore the world beyond their immediate experience and to prepare themselves for their turn at shaping that world...
...It is beneficial to encourage young people to explore the broader world and get ready to make it a better place...
...I'll explore these ideas in a column...
...What does the author say about America's aim to explore space...
...The urge to explore space is just the opposite...

remMethod.val: ex ＋ pl ＋ ore(矿石) → 把矿石挖出来 → 探索

trans.tranCn: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
trans.tranOther: to discuss or think about something carefully
